Package com.bcdipesh.patternMatcherUtils

Interface PatternMatcherUtility

public interface PatternMatcherUtility
This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on files, directories, or other types of files.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dipesh B.C.

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static byte[] convertToByteArray​(java.lang.String[] line)
    Converts a string[] to byte array.
    static int countTotalFilesInDir​(java.io.File dir)
    Gets the total file count present inside a directory.
    static byte[] getByteArray​(java.lang.String hexString)
    Gets a byte array given a hexadecimal string.
    static java.util.ArrayList<java.nio.file.Path> listFilesWithinDirectory​(java.io.File dir)
    Lists only file Path contained within a directory.
    static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Byte>> readDirectory​(java.io.File dir)
    Reads a directory.
    static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Byte> readFile​(java.io.File file)
    Reads the content of file as bytes given the target File.
    static java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> readPatternFile​(java.io.File patternFile)
    Reads a pattern file.
    static java.lang.String[] splitStringUsingSpace​(java.lang.String stringToSplit)

  • Method Details

    • readDirectory

      static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Byte>> readDirectory​(java.io.File dir) throws java.io.IOException
      Reads a directory. This function reads a directory containing multiple files as bytes.
      Parameters:
      dir - The directory containing multiple files.
      Returns:
      Returns a TreeMap with String that represents the file name inside directory as key, and an ArrayList of Byte that represents the bytes of content within the file as value.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an IOException if the file passed to it is invalid.

    • readFile

      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Byte> readFile​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      Reads the content of file as bytes given the target File.
      Parameters:
      file - The file to read.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of Byte containing the contents of the file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs reading from the path.

    • readPatternFile

      static java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> readPatternFile​(java.io.File patternFile) throws java.io.IOException
      Reads a pattern file. This function reads a pattern file containing pattern/patterns to be searched.
      Parameters:
      patternFile - The file to read.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of byte[] containing list of pattern/patterns to be searched.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an IOException if the file passed to it is invalid.

    • listFilesWithinDirectory

      static java.util.ArrayList<java.nio.file.Path> listFilesWithinDirectory​(java.io.File dir) throws java.io.IOException
      Lists only file Path contained within a directory.
      Parameters:
      dir - The directory containing multiple files
      Returns:
      Returns a ArrayList of Path representing the Path to the file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws and IOException if the file passed to it is invalid.

    • countTotalFilesInDir

      static int countTotalFilesInDir​(java.io.File dir)
      Gets the total file count present inside a directory. Note: This function only counts the total files present in a directory of depth 1, i.e., it won't count files inside sub-directories.
      Returns:
      Returns the total file count inside a directory.

    • splitStringUsingSpace

      static java.lang.String[] splitStringUsingSpace​(java.lang.String stringToSplit)
      Takes a String and splits it into String array using single space.
      Parameters:
      stringToSplit - The String to split.
      Returns:
      Returns a String array containing the result of the split.

    • getByteArray

      static byte[] getByteArray​(java.lang.String hexString)
      Gets a byte array given a hexadecimal string. This function converts a hexadecimal string to return a byte array.
      Parameters:
      hexString - A string representing hexadecimal number.
      Returns:
      Returns a byte[] that represents the hexadecimal number.

    • convertToByteArray

      static byte[] convertToByteArray​(java.lang.String[] line)
      Converts a string[] to byte array. This function converts a string[] representing hexadecimal numbers to a byte array.
      Parameters:
      line - A String array representing hexadecimal values.
      Returns:
      Returns a byte[] of hexadecimal values.
